greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of average of prime factors of n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..5000
mathematica: f[n_] := Plus @@ Times @@@ FactorInteger@n; f[1] = 0; Numerator[ Table[ f[n]/PrimeOmega[n], {n, 2, 50}]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 14 2017 *)
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Oct 02 2006
